005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.regex.RegexUtil;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.regex.RegularExpressionMetapathException;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IStringItem;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CollectionUtil;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
020
021import java.util.LinkedList;
022import java.util.List;
023import java.util.regex.Matcher;
024import java.util.regex.Pattern;
025import java.util.regex.PatternSyntaxException;
026
027import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
028import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
029
030/**
031 * Implements the XPath 3.1 <a href=
032 * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-tokenize">fn:tokenize</a>
033 * function.
034 */
035public final class FnTokenize {
036  // CPD-OFF
037  @NonNull
038  private static final String NAME = "tokenize";
039  @NonNull
040  static final IFunction SIGNATURE_ONE_ARG = IFunction.builder()
041      .name(NAME)
042      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
043      .deterministic()
044      .contextIndependent()
045      .focusIndependent()
046      .argument(IArgument.builder()
047          .name("input")
048          .type(IStringItem.type())
049          .zeroOrOne()
050          .build())
051      .returnType(IStringItem.type())
052      .returnZeroOrMore()
053      .functionHandler(FnTokenize::executeOneArg)
054      .build();
055  @NonNull
056  static final IFunction SIGNATURE_TWO_ARG = IFunction.builder()
057      .name(NAME)
058      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
059      .deterministic()
060      .contextIndependent()
061      .focusIndependent()
062      .argument(IArgument.builder()
063          .name("input")
064          .type(IStringItem.type())
065          .zeroOrOne()
066          .build())
067      .argument(IArgument.builder()
068          .name("pattern")
069          .type(IStringItem.type())
070          .one()
071          .build())
072      .returnType(IStringItem.type())
073      .returnZeroOrMore()
074      .functionHandler(FnTokenize::executeTwoArg)
075      .build();
076
077  @NonNull
078  static final IFunction SIGNATURE_THREE_ARG = IFunction.builder()
079      .name(NAME)
080      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
081      .deterministic()
082      .contextIndependent()
083      .focusIndependent()
084      .argument(IArgument.builder()
085          .name("input")
086          .type(IStringItem.type())
087          .zeroOrOne()
088          .build())
089      .argument(IArgument.builder()
090          .name("pattern")
091          .type(IStringItem.type())
092          .one()
093          .build())
094      .argument(IArgument.builder()
095          .name("flags")
096          .type(IStringItem.type())
097          .one()
098          .build())
099      .returnType(IStringItem.type())
100      .returnZeroOrMore()
101      .functionHandler(FnTokenize::executeThreeArg)
102      .build();
103  // CPD-ON
104
105  @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.UnusedFormalParameter", "unused" })
106  @NonNull
107  private static ISequence<IStringItem> executeOneArg(
108      @NonNull IFunction function,
109      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
110      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
111      IItem focus) {
112    IStringItem input = FunctionUtils.asTypeOrNull(arguments.get(0).getFirstItem(true));
113
114    return input == null
115        ? ISequence.empty()
116        : ISequence.of(ObjectUtils.notNull(
117            fnTokenize(input.normalizeSpace().asString(), " ", "").stream()
118                .map(IStringItem::valueOf)));
119  }
120
121  @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.UnusedFormalParameter", "unused" })
122  @NonNull
123  private static ISequence<IStringItem> executeTwoArg(
124      @NonNull IFunction function,
125      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
126      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
127      IItem focus) {
128    IStringItem input = FunctionUtils.asTypeOrNull(arguments.get(0).getFirstItem(true));
129    IStringItem pattern = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(FunctionUtils.asTypeOrNull(arguments.get(1).getFirstItem(true)));
130
131    return execute(input, pattern, IStringItem.valueOf(""));
132  }
133
134  @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.UnusedFormalParameter", "unused" })
135  @NonNull
136  private static ISequence<IStringItem> executeThreeArg(
137      @NonNull IFunction function,
138      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
139      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
140      IItem focus) {
141
142    IStringItem input = FunctionUtils.asTypeOrNull(arguments.get(0).getFirstItem(true));
143    IStringItem pattern = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(FunctionUtils.asTypeOrNull(arguments.get(1).getFirstItem(true)));
144    IStringItem flags = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(FunctionUtils.asTypeOrNull(arguments.get(2).getFirstItem(true)));
145
146    return execute(input, pattern, flags);
147  }
148
149  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.OnlyOneReturn")
150  @NonNull
151  private static ISequence<IStringItem> execute(
152      @Nullable IStringItem input,
153      @NonNull IStringItem pattern,
154      @NonNull IStringItem flags) {
155    return input == null
156        ? ISequence.empty()
157        : fnTokenize(input, pattern, flags);
158  }
159
160  /**
161   * Implements <a href=
162   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-tokenize">fn:tokenize</a>.
163   *
164   * @param input
165   *          the string to tokenize
166   * @param pattern
167   *          the regular expression to use for identifying token boundaries
168   * @param flags
169   *          matching options
170   * @return the sequence of tokens
171   */
172  @NonNull
173  public static ISequence<IStringItem> fnTokenize(
174      @NonNull IStringItem input,
175      @NonNull IStringItem pattern,
176      @NonNull IStringItem flags) {
177    return ISequence.of(ObjectUtils.notNull(
178        fnTokenize(input.asString(), pattern.asString(), flags.asString()).stream()
179            .map(IStringItem::valueOf)));
180  }
181
182  /**
183   * Implements <a href=
184   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-tokenize">fn:tokenize</a>.
185   *
186   * @param input
187   *          the string to match against
188   * @param pattern
189   *          the regular expression to use for matching
190   * @param flags
191   *          matching options
192   * @return the stream of tokens
193   */
194  @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.OnlyOneReturn", "PMD.CyclomaticComplexity" })
195  @NonNull
196  public static List<String> fnTokenize(@NonNull String input, @NonNull String pattern, @NonNull String flags) {
197    if (input.isEmpty()) {
198      return CollectionUtil.emptyList();
199    }
200
201    try {
202      Matcher matcher = Pattern.compile(pattern, RegexUtil.parseFlags(flags)).matcher(input);
203
204      int lastPosition = 0;
205      int length = input.length();
206
207      List<String> result = new LinkedList<>();
208      while (matcher.find()) {
209        String group = matcher.group();
210        if (group.isEmpty()) {
211          throw new RegularExpressionMetapathException(RegularExpressionMetapathException.MATCHES_ZERO_LENGTH_STRING,
212              String.format("Pattern '%s' will match a zero-length string.", pattern));
213        }
214
215        int start = matcher.start();
216        if (start == 0) {
217          result.add("");
218        } else {
219          result.add(input.substring(lastPosition, start));
220        }
221
222        lastPosition = matcher.end();
223      }
224
225      if (lastPosition == length) {
226        result.add("");
227      } else {
228        result.add(input.substring(lastPosition, length));
229      }
230
231      return result;
232    } catch (PatternSyntaxException ex) {
233      throw new RegularExpressionMetapathException(RegularExpressionMetapathException.INVALID_EXPRESSION, ex);
234    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
235      throw new RegularExpressionMetapathException(RegularExpressionMetapathException.INVALID_FLAG, ex);
236    }
237  }
238
239  private FnTokenize() {
240    // disable construction
241  }
242}
